description: A quickstart to set up a Mina Node Dashboard

targets.expr:
(
  (1 - rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="mina", mode="idle", instance="$instance"}[$__interval]))
/ ignoring(cpu) group_left
  count without (cpu)( node_cpu_seconds_total{job="mina", mode="idle", instance="$instance"})
)

title: Mina Node Dashboard
